review:
I bought it for my Parents. For a Nexus5 and for a Moto G2. It worked fine for
a week. After that, one fine day, after removing the cable after a full 100%
charge, the Nexus went off. Didn't switch on after that. Same happened to the
Moto G2 about 2 days later. The problem was not with the charger because I've
been using the same Charger for both the phones for the past one year or so.
One week after getting this, both the phones faced this problem. I went to the
service center and they asked me to replace the motherboard which would cost
me about Rs. 10,000.

Good quality product. Timely delivery. But NOT 3 FEET, ONLY 1 FEET wrong
information. Kindly update and check please.

Working fine in charging my phone.Delivers 2 Amps unlike many other cheap
cables which only delivers less current.The quality of the cable is good and I
definitely recommend this product.

I use redmi note 4 and this cable work like original cable. Fast charging,
sleek and look durable. Thanks amazon to provide such a quality cable at
reasonable price.

Amazon basics cables are best. I buy them even when I don't need them
immediately, esp for future use whenever the lightning deal is there. Micro
USB cables are wonderful. with Gold pated contacts the longevity is
ensured.You will have a premium feeleverytime you use them.The Metal tip is
slightly bigger than cheap cables and this is big advantage as I can connect
the same to any of my mobiles even with casing too close to the charging
ports, where the other cheap cables don't work because of shorter prong size.

Amazing. I loved the cable, its long, feels rugged. It gives proper charging
current/voltage and I checked it with 2 phones using Ampere app. Go for it at
this price . I am using it to connect my phone to PC while its on tripod as
webcam.

Lost my Redmi note 4 cable and started using this one. No issues whatsoever.
Also the Mi cable always chips and tears at the edges but this one has proper
protection at the ends

i have used this USB properly and I must say that they are durable. BUT if
they say that they have a gold plated USB they are telling a Lie my *My lead
have lost the shine that it would probably have * but i must say if you are
looking for a durable and steady lead that it is the best in market i have no
regret whatsoever.

It worked at the starting....phone was charging very fast but after a month or
two my phone started getting discharge when i plug in this usb...i checked the
adapter and it was fine so basically the problem was with this usb...

Little hard material, wish it was little softer. Overall a good product and
will recommend others. I use it for my XBox controller but find it little hard
and get constant fear of my controller port getting destroyed :D
